Articles.Content:
The load button from the VAB won't work :C, can someone help me? I tried deleting the persistence file, i tried deleting all my saves, i tried deleting all my subassemblies, nothing worked!

Edit: I made a thread at Support - modded : http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/100831-Load-button-won-t-work?p=1554700&posted=1

Edited November 22, 2014 by Unknow0059

Are you using any mods? (This should be in support though, either of the two categories.)

I recall running into an issue like this after incorrectly updating a mod.

Are you using any mods? (This should be in support though, either of the two categories.)

I recall running into an issue like this after incorrectly updating a mod.

Yes im using a lot of mods, however i dont update any mod that i have.

Yes im using a lot of mods, however i dont update any mod that i have.

There's your problem right there, it is entirely possible that one of your mods whch hasn't been updated (And I am assuming you are not using the latest version) is giving you issues, check to make sure they are all the latest versions.

There's your problem right there, it is entirely possible that one of your mods whch hasn't been updated (And I am assuming you are not using the latest version) is giving you issues, check to make sure they are all the latest versions.

I updated all my mods, it didn't work.

I updated all my mods, it didn't work.

Alright, the next option is to (and you're not going to like this) remove all your craft files, and replace them one by one. I'm nearly positive that one of them has gotten corrupted.

Alright, the next option is to (and you're not going to like this) remove all your craft files, and replace them one by one. I'm nearly positive that one of them has gotten corrupted.

I already have tried removing ALL the craft files, leaving no one, it didn't work.

I already have tried removing ALL the craft files, leaving no one, it didn't work.

Well, I'm out of ideas, try posting in the Support forum?

If you've already tried removing the .craft files, make sure you don't delete the directories (or you'll break it more). After that, check the folder permissions.

If you're absolutely certain that you've already checked those things, then check this thread and follow the directions to upload a log file. http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/92230-Stock-Support-Bug-Reporting-Guide

I'm going to leave this thread here until I know for sure if you're still using mods or not.

Cheers,

~Claw

Is it only affecting the VAB, or is it affecting the Spaceplane Hangar as well? If you are ABSOLUTELY sure that there's nothing you can do, here's a last resort:

Move your .craft files from the Vehicle Assembly Building to the Spaceplane Hangar, launch the craft, and revert the flight. If I'm right, your craft will be moved to the Vehicle Assembly Building, because the craft type is VAB in the file.

If this doesn't work, you may have to resort to remaking your crafts or re-installing the game.
I made a thread at Support - Modded, thanks for trying guys.
